snp2.5:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava gayayam viharati tankitamance sucilomassa yakkhassa bhavane.
snp2.5:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena kharo ca yakkho sucilomo ca yakkho bhagavato avidure atikkamanti.
snp2.5:1.4: Atha kho kharo yakkho sucilomam yakkham etadavoca:
snp2.5:1.7: Yavaham janami yadi va so samano, yadi va so samanako”ti.
snp2.5:2.1: Atha kho sucilomo yakkho yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavato kayam upanamesi.
snp2.5:2.3: Atha kho sucilomo yakkho bhagavantam etadavoca:
snp2.5:3.2: Sace me na byakarissasi, cittam va te khipissami, hadayam va te phalessami, padesu va gahetva paragangaya khipissami”ti.
snp2.5:4.1: “Na khvaham tam, avuso, passami sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya yo me cittam va khipeyya hadayam va phaleyya padesu va gahetva paragangaya khipeyya.
snp2.5:4.2: Api ca tvam, avuso, puccha yadakankhasi”ti.
snp2.5:4.3: Atha kho sucilomo yakkho bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
